item.title: Feb 01 Class
item.description: TBD We will meet in our Friday classroom (which is different from both your Monday classroom and our Friday lab space). It is 103 Brower (campus map location). Learning species See also Afternotes

item.title: Class Instructions
item.description: (This page is under development) Our Friday classes will be at 11:15â€“12:40 in 103 Brower (campus map location). Usual timeline Usually our 85-minute class sessions will normally be structured like this: quiz (up to 15 minutes) an identification topic (about 25 minutes) learning identifications (about 40 minutes) Quiz Each week we will have an identification quiz at the beginning of class. The quiz will consist of ten identifications.
